resources.string: Thank you for installing our add-ons app. Tap the button below to hide this app from your app drawer.

This app is only designed to enable add-ons for select Creative Trends apps. This app must remain installed for add-ons to work.

App not installed, launching Play Store.
This app is not licensed and will not function. Please consider downloading this app from Google Play.
